Summary: Dogs love it. We've switched from Pedigree.
text:
My dogs absolutely loved Beneful.
The first day I mixed it with their normal dog food (Pedigree). They promptly fished through their bowls and ate the Beneful first. I figured it was just because it was new. Nearly two weeks later they are still sorting their food. Now the mix is about 80% Beneful and 20% Pedigree. They leave the Pedigree on the floor next to the bowl.
I haven't noticed and I'll effects-no excess gas, no digestive issues, no burnt grass that we tend to get with other brands (Iams).
